B C D E F G I L M R S T 

B

borrowBook(LibraryCard) - Method in class Library
borrowBook method that returns a textbook object, that allows for a textbook to be borrowed.

C

closeBook() - Method in class TextBook
closeBook method sets the chaptersRead back to 0.
College - Class in <Unnamed>
The College Class represents a college object, where a list of students will attend and a library object within the college.
College(int, int) - Constructor for class College
Constructor for objects of class College, used to initialize College objects.

D

describe() - Method in class College
Describe method that represents the college in terms of number of students, number of textbooks available in the library.
describe() - Method in class Library
Describe method that represents the library in terms of number of books on the shelf, and number of library cards issued.
describe() - Method in class LibraryCard
Describe method that represents the library card in terms of its card refernce, and the remaining borrowing allowance.
describe() - Method in class Student
Describe method that represents the student in terms of their name, and whether they have a book.
describe() - Method in class TextBook
Describe method that represents the textbook in terms of its title, with the number of chapter left to be read.

E

expired() - Method in class LibraryCard
expired method checks whether the card has expired by comparing the limit on the card, to the number of books borrowed on that card.

F

finishedStudies() - Method in class Student
finishedStudies method that checks if the students library card is active (not expired), and if so, will check if the student has finished studying i.e.

G

getCardRef() - Method in class LibraryCard
getCardRef method gets the card reference number.
getTitle() - Method in class TextBook
getTitle method gets the title of a textbook.

I

isFinished() - Method in class TextBook
isFinished method checks whether the student has read all of the chapters.
issueCard() - Method in class Library
issueCard method that returns a library card object, that issues a new card.

L

Library - Class in <Unnamed>
The Libary Class represents a library object, where textbooks will be stored for students to borrow.
Library(int) - Constructor for class Library
Constructor for objects of class Library, used to initialize Library objects.
LibraryCard - Class in <Unnamed>
The Library Card Class represents a library card object, where a library card will have an id number and maximum number of borrows.
LibraryCard(int, int) - Constructor for class LibraryCard
Constructor for objects of class LibraryCard, used to initialize Library card objects.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class College
Main method to allow class to be run from command line

R

readNextChapter() - Method in class TextBook
readNextChapter checks whether the textbook is finished, else increments the number of chapters read by 1.
returnBook(TextBook) - Method in class Library
returnBook method that returns a textbook object, that allows for a textbookto be returned to the shelf.
runCollege(int) - Method in class College
runCollege method takes input of number of steps from the user, then runs the describe and nextStep() methods that many times returning the currentStep to the user.

S

Student - Class in <Unnamed>
The Student Class represents a student object, where the student will be able to take out textbooks, study and return books.The student object will attend a college, and will interact with textbooks, library cards and the library.
Student(String, Library) - Constructor for class Student
Constructor for objects of class Student, used to initialize College objects.
study() - Method in class Student
Study method checks if student has a textbook and if it is finished if they dont have a textbook, makes the student borrow one from the library, if they have a textbook and it is not finished, makes the student read the next chapter of the textbook if they have a textbook and it is finished, makes the student close the book and return it to the library, then borrow a new book
swipe() - Method in class LibraryCard
swipe method increases the number of books borrowed by the student.

T

TextBook - Class in <Unnamed>
The Textbook Class represents a textbook object, where textbooks will have a set number of chapters, that the students can read.
TextBook(String, int) - Constructor for class TextBook
Constructor for objects of class Textbook, used to initialize Textbook objects.
